content:
Yes, you're right. Let's remove the `verification_system.md` file as well since it's been replaced by the more comprehensive `verification_process.md`:

```bash
# Remove both redundant verification documentation files - copy entire box
rm docs/claude/verification_system.md docs/claude/verification_system_simplified.md
```

This will ensure we have just one clear, authoritative document on the verification process, avoiding any confusion from having multiple overlapping files.
